text:
どうした負け犬?
彼氏がお前を
恋しがってんのか?

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 26.22%;top: 42.14%;width: 9.79%;height: 10.77%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
コスタ
イジメは
やめろ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 20.80%;top: 63.52%;width: 14.04%;height: 7.63%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 53.67%;top: 62.34%;width: 15.53%;height: 6.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
けど
誰よりも早く
能力を得た
優越を鼻にかけ
他人への
嫌がらせを
やめないよな
